title: Requirements Gathering
description: Collaborate with stakeholders to gather and document project requirements in a clear, concise, and feasible manner that aligns with the project scope. Focus on understanding the technical and non-technical aspects of the system design.

title: Design the NeuralCreativityAmplifier System
description: Create a high-level design for the system architecture and user interfaces

title: Develop the Frontend Interface
description: Create a user-friendly and intuitive interface for controlling and interacting with the NeuralCreativityAmplifier system. The interface should enable users to adjust settings, monitor progress, receive feedback on their creative output, and offer a seamless user experience. This includes implementing responsive design for various devices.

title: Implement the Backend Logic
description: Develop the server-side logic for processing and responding to user inputs. This includes data handling, model integration, and response generation.

title: Integrate Database Functionality
description: Design and implement a robust database schema for efficient storage of user data, system logs, and machine learning models relevant to the NeuralCreativityAmplifier. Consider scalability, data security, and easy querying. The design should align with the principles of NoSQL databases due to the expected high volume of data and real-time requirements.

title: Test the NeuralCreativityAmplifier System
description: Execute functional and performance tests on the system to ensure correctness and efficiency. This includes testing the entire system from frontend interface, backend logic, to database functionality. Additionally, suggest improvements for potential issues found during testing.

title: Deploy the NeuralCreativityAmplifier System
description: Prepare and execute deployment procedures for production environment. Please ensure all necessary tests have been conducted prior to this step.

title: Review and Approve Design Documents
description: Review design documents for accuracy, completeness, and adherence to project requirements

title: Review and Approve Requirements Document
description: Review requirements document for accuracy, completeness, and feasibility
